abstract: When Carl C. Icahn purchased 1-percent stakes in two well-established biotech companies, MedImmune and Biogen Idec, the moves drew little attention.
lead_paragraph: When Carl C. Icahn purchased 1-percent stakes in two well-established biotech companies, MedImmune and Biogen Idec, the moves drew little attention.

headline.main: Genzyme May Be Icahn’s Next Biotech Target
